data.text: We all know in this room people that have spent hours,

data.text: finger fucking with their model online.

data.text: you called it the snowflake generation.

data.text: Oh.

translation.text: Oh.

data.text: Well snowflake means you melt under pressure, okay,

data.text: meaning you can go to a place in the building

data.text: when life's getting too rough, and you can just chill out.

data.text: Well, life's not like that, there is no safe space in life.

translation.text: Chà, cuộc sống không như vậy, không có không gian an toàn trong cuộc sống.

data.text: Back 15 years ago when I first met you,

translation.text: Trở lại 15 năm trước khi tôi gặp bạn lần đầu tiên,

data.text: there was no safe space,

translation.text: Càng căng thẳng, càng thành công.

data.text: Why do you think nowadays the kids are snowflakes?

translation.text: Tại sao bạn nghĩ rằng những đứa trẻ ngày nay là những bông tuyết?

data.text: Well, it's because their parents were snowflakes.
